title: Japanese Companies in Malaysia: CSR & Community Engagement
description: Case studies of CSR by Japanese‑affiliated firms in Malaysia; document analysis plus brief stakeholder interviews.

title: K‑pop Fan Labor, Identity, and Community in Kuala Lumpur
description: Explore how K‑pop fans coordinate events, translations, and fundraising; interviews + small survey.

title: Chinese‑Medium Education and Language Maintenance
description: Investigate how Chinese‑medium schooling shapes language maintenance and identity; school policy docs + interviews.

title: Dual‑Coding Aids for Beginner Kanji in Malaysian Classrooms
description: Design pictorial + audio aids for 20 beginner kanji and test recall over two weeks (pre/post).

title: Motivations for Korean Language Study at Malaysian Universities
description: Survey + interviews on why students choose Korean language; link to employability and pop‑culture exposure.

title: Anime/Manga Influence on Malaysian Creative Industries
description: Analyze how anime/manga aesthetics inform local design, comics, and merchandising; content + interviews.

title: East Asian Foodways and Diaspora Identity in Penang
description: Field observations and micro‑interviews in selected neighborhoods to map food, memory, and identity.

title: Belt and Road in Malaysian Media: Framing & Public Opinion
description: Content analysis of local news and social posts on BRI; identify frames and sentiment over time.

title: K‑Beauty Adoption in Malaysia: Consumers and Influencers
description: Short survey + influencer post analysis to examine purchase intentions and brand trust.

title: Bon Odori in Malaysia: Policy, Religion, and Public Discourse
description: Document controversy timelines, analyze statements, and conduct interviews with organizers/attendees.

title: Mapping Japanese‑Affiliated Firms in Malaysia
description: Clean and geocode company data; build an interactive map to explore spatial/sectoral patterns.

title: Workplace Culture in East Asian‑Owned Firms in Malaysia
description: Interviews with employees to compare communication, hierarchy, and work expectations across firms.

title: Social Media Sentiment on China/Japan/Korea in Malaysia
description: Collect public posts (APIs/exports), run basic sentiment classification, and compare topic trends.

title: Heritage Trails: East Asian Sites in Kuala Lumpur
description: Create a digital heritage trail (map/story map) linking sites, oral histories, and archival images.

title: Chinese Tech Platforms and Malaysian SMEs: Cross‑Border E‑Commerce
description: How Malaysian SMEs use China‑linked platforms (e‑commerce, payments, logistics); interviews + small analytics.

title: Internships in Japanese Firms: Work Culture Socialization in Malaysia
description: Student experiences of hierarchy, teamwork, and communication in Japanese‑affiliated workplaces; qualitative study.

title: Korean Food Franchises in Klang Valley: Localization Strategies
description: Menu, branding, and service adaptations in K‑food chains; content analysis + manager interviews.

title: Language Policy for East Asian Languages in Malaysian Universities
description: Document analysis of elective offerings (CN/JP/KR), staffing, and policy rationales; admin interviews.

title: Anime Conventions and Soft Power in Malaysia
description: Event ethnography + survey to measure cultural attachment and perceived Japan image among attendees.

title: Traditional Chinese Medicine in Malaysia: Practice and Regulation
description: Map TCM clinics, analyze regulatory documents, and interview practitioners on integration with public health.

title: Framing East Asia in Malaysian Newsrooms
description: Content + discourse analysis of Malaysia‑based media coverage of China/Japan/Korea over the last year.

title: Short‑Video Content Flows from East Asia and Malaysian Youth
description: Track content genres and engagement from CN/JP/KR origin accounts; diary study + platform metadata sampling.

title: Translanguaging in K‑pop Fan Subbing Communities (Malaysia)
description: Analyze fan translations and comment threads for code‑switching and stance; corpus + interviews.

title: Family Memories of the Japanese Occupation
description: Oral histories and photo/letter archives to document intergenerational memory and local narratives.

title: Malaysia and North Korea: A Documentary Timeline (2000–2020)
description: Compile statements, sanctions, and diplomatic incidents; analyze shifts in policy narratives.

title: Chinese FDI and Supply Chains: The Case of MCKIP
description: Policy docs + firm reports to assess investment drivers, employment, and local linkages; basic input–output view.

title: Japanese Language Learning and Employability in Malaysia
description: Survey employers and students on JLPT levels, internships, and hiring signals; link to job postings.

title: ESG Reporting by East Asian Subsidiaries in Malaysia
description: Compare ESG disclosures of CN/JP/KR subsidiaries; score themes and alignment with local regulations.

title: Privacy Attitudes among WeChat/LINE/Kakao Users in Malaysia
description: Survey + vignettes to measure trust and data‑sharing norms across app ecosystems.

title: Anime Tourism and Domestic Travel in Malaysia
description: Link pop‑culture events to local travel intentions and spending; intercept surveys at events.
